name: Marinated Feta
author: sono1helen
summary: I'm well aware that everyone knows this marinated feta recipe or does it in their own way, but that's how I cook it - it's a quick appetizer for unexpected guests that just rang a doorbell to your house. Keeps well in the refrigerator.
ingredients: 2  fresh sage leaves, or more to taste
1 sprig fresh rosemary, or more to taste
¼  red bell pepper, finely chopped
1 tablespoon toasted sesame-ginger seasoning (such as Victoria Gourmet ®)
directions: Place a layer of olives, sage, garlic, chile pepper, rosemary, bell pepper, sesame-ginger seasoning, pepperoncini pepper, and oregano into the bottom of a container
Add a layer of feta cheese
Pour olive oil into the container to cover feta mixture completely
